issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The product is working as designed.
resolution.name: Not a Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
I've been unable to migrate an instance with vmware. There may be multiple issues preventing a successful vmware cluster migration at the moment. This issue is opened to track 'migration false' reported for hosts/nodes that have vmotion enabled. Resulting in: "not enough resources available for migration"

Thanks,
-M

From broker log:
{code}
10.111.1.180: BrokerReply {DescribeResource: status: enabled migration: false iqn: iqn.1998-01.com.vmware:g-05-08-7ed4e4b2 cores: 3/4 mem: 1084/1340 disk: 1897472/1902592}
{code}

{code}

			<host name='10.111.1.116' login='root' password='foobar'/>
		</endpoint>
	</vsphere>
	<paths scratchDirectory='/disk1/storage/eucalyptus/instances/vmware/work' cacheDirectory='/disk1/storage/eucalyptus/instances/vmware/cache'/>
</configuration>

fields.summary: vmware unable to migrate instances. migration reported as false

comments.body:
[~vasya] informed me this is a 5.0 esx host, ver < 5.1 are not supported. 
Not a bug. Closing. 
Thanks!
-M
